channel.title: Will give REP++ if you know how to make it say when a staff loggs in [525]
channel.description: Does anyone know how to make it say when a staff has logged in? like... Alex the owner has just logged in?

item.title: Will give REP++ if you know how to make it say when a staff loggs in [525]
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

Obviously you’ll have to replace name/methods as I don’t know/memorize them.

Under where login is handled, add something similar to this:

if(player.getUsername().equals("emily")) {
			for(Player players : World.getWorld().getPlayers()) {
				players.getActionSender().sendMessage("Emily logged in bitches.");
			}
		}

Read full topic
item.source: Will give REP++ if you know how to make it say when a staff loggs in [525]

item.title: Will give REP++ if you know how to make it say when a staff loggs in [525]
item.dc:creator: @totalystylin1 totalystylin1
item.description:
@totalystylin1 wrote:

[quote=“stooks, post:10, topic:414270”][quote author=stooks link=topic=516235.msg3746175#msg3746175 date=1315720278]

if(player.getRights() == 1) { player.player = 0; player.admin = 0; player.main = 0; player.coowner = 0; player.player = 0; player.mod = 1; player.owner = 0; for(Player p : World.getWorld().getPlayers()) { if (p ==null) { continue; } p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=a7a7a7><shad=030303>Moderator <img=0>"+player.getDisplayName()+" has logged in."); continue; } } if(player.getRights() == 2 && player.owner == 0 && player.coowner == 0 && player.headadmin == 0 && !player.getUsername().equals("alex_dkk")) { player.player = 0; player.admin = 1; player.main = 0; player.coowner = 0; player.player = 0; player.mod = 0; player.owner = 0; player.headadmin = 0; for(Player p : World.getWorld().getPlayers()) { if (p ==null) { continue; } p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=ffff00><shad=030303>Administrator <img=1>"+player.getDisplayName()+" has logged in."); continue; } }
something like dat
[/quote]
Than this should work -.-[/quote]
Where do i put this?

stop fucking saying 525 its 317 loading 602+ or some shit. its in client.java

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Alex")) { for(int j = 0; j < PlayerHandlers.players.length; j++) { if(PlayerHandlers.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)PlayerHandlers.players[j]; c2.sendMessage(playerName + " has just logged in!andisgay"): } } }
